name: XOMBIEs !
description:
TUTORIAL

- Scroll to move!

- Run over Supplies to collect them!

- Right Click to move faster!

This is shashKing's "MOUSE ONLY" FPS!

STORY:

- DON'T BE A HERO! YOU ARE JUST A SCIENTIST in a prototype "iNVISIBLE" suit

- SURVIVE till some Shepherd agent finds your beacon

- SURVIVE by collecting Supplies!

You and i play games because we have nothing better to do!

After my Keyboard only game, this is my "Mouse Only" game!

Don't worry, i bought the assets.

I am to be blamed for all the coding as I was so foolish to create my own FPS character controller."

-shashKing
